variable.name: ANGINA
variable.comment: Angina is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Angina occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: ANGINADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Angina

variable.name: ANGINASRC
variable.comment: Angina ascertainment source Angina was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: CABG
variable.comment: Coronary Artery Bypass Graft (CABG) CABG is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. CABG occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: CABGDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CABG

variable.name: CABGSRC
variable.comment: CABG ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for CABG. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CAROTID
variable.comment: Carotid Artery Disease is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Carotid Artery Disease occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: CAROTIDDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Carotid Artery Disease
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Carotid Artery Disease

variable.name: CAROTIDSRC
variable.comment: Carotid Artery Disease ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Carotid Artery Disease. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CHD
variable.comment: Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) Defined as the first occurence of Clinical MI, Definite Silent MI or a Death due to CHD (defined before 10/99), Definite CHD or Possible CHD. Some of these outcomes are only adjudicated for a subset of WHI participants.

variable.name: CHDDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CHD

variable.name: CHDSRC
variable.comment: CHD ascertainment source CHD is defined as the first occurence of Clinical MI, Definite Silent MI or a Death due to CHD (defined before 10/99), Definite CHD or Possible CHD. The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: CHF
variable.comment: Congestive Heart Failure (CHF) CHF is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout.

variable.name: CHFDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first CHF

variable.name: CHFSRC
variable.comment: CHF ascertainment source CHF was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: MI
variable.comment: Clinical MI is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: MIDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Clinical MI

variable.name: MISRC
variable.comment: Clinical MI ascertainment source During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Clinical MI were only done for HT participants. Local adjudication data was used for other participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CREVASC
variable.comment: Coronary revascularization procedure (CABG or PTCA) Defined as the first occurence of CABG or PTCA. Coronary Revascularization is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CREVASCDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Coronary Revascularization

variable.name: CREVASCSRC
variable.comment: Coronary Revascularization ascertainment source Coronary Revascularization is defined as the first occurence of CABG or PTCA. During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Coronary Revascularization. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: DSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.1 or 5.2. ECGs were collected for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Definite Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: DSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Definite Silent MI
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Definite Silent MI

variable.name: DSMISRC
variable.comment: Definite Silent MI ascertainment source

variable.name: DVT
variable.comment: Deep Vein Thrombosis (DVT) DVT is adjudicated for HT participants only.

variable.name: DVTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first DVT

variable.name: DVTSRC
variable.comment: DVT ascertainment source Central adjudications were done for all DVT. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: STRKHEMO
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates a hemorrhagic stroke. Hemorrhagic Stroke is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to record Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification for procedure related Strokes.

variable.name: STRKHEMODY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Hemorrhagic Stroke

variable.name: STRKHEMOSRC
variable.comment: Hemorrhagic Stroke ascertainment source

variable.name: STRKISCH
variable.comment: Defined as a Stroke where the diagnosis question indicates an iscemic stroke. Ischemic Stroke is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Form 121 and early versions of 132 were not able to record Hemorrhagic/Ischemic classification for procedure related Strokes.

variable.name: STRKISCHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Ischemic Stroke

variable.name: STRKISCHSRC
variable.comment: Ischemic Stroke ascertainment source

variable.name: PERIPH
variable.comment: Peripheral Arterial Disease (PAD) PAD is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: PERIPHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PAD

variable.name: PERIPHSRC
variable.comment: PAD ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PAD. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: PE
variable.comment: Pulmonary Embolism (PE) Defined as the first occurence of PE or a Death due to Pulmonary Embolism. PE is adjudicated for HT participants only.

variable.name: PEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PE

variable.name: PESRC
variable.comment: PE ascertainment source PE is defined as the first occurence of PE or a Death due to Pulmonary Embolism. Central adjudications were done for all PE. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: PSMI
variable.comment: Defined as an ECG with an evolving Q-wave MI based on an incident Novacode of 5.3 or 5.4. ECGs were collected for CT participants at baseline, av3, av6 and av9. Possible Silent MI occurring on or after a Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI is not counted.

variable.name: PSMIDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Possible Silent MI
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Possible Silent MI

variable.name: PSMISRC
variable.comment: Possible Silent MI ascertainment source

variable.name: PTCA
variable.comment: Percutaneous Transluminal Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA) PTCA is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. PTCA occurring on or after a Clinical MI is not counted.

variable.name: PTCADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first PTCA

variable.name: PTCASRC
variable.comment: PTCA ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for PTCA. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: STROKE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Stroke or a Death due to Cerebrovascular. Stroke is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. In order to be able to classify strokes, WHI uses central adjudications if possible, even though Strokes were only fully centrally adjudicated in HT participants.

variable.name: STROKEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Stroke

variable.name: STROKESRC
variable.comment: Stroke ascertainment source Stroke is defined as the first occurence of Stroke or a Death due to Cerebrovascular. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Stroke. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: TIA
variable.comment: Transient Ischemic Attack (TIA) TIA is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. TIA occurring on or after a Stroke is not counted.

variable.name: TIADY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first TIA

variable.name: TIASRC
variable.comment: TIA ascertainment source During the core WHI study, central adjudications of TIA were only done for HT participants. Local adjudication data was used for other participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: MITOTAL
variable.comment: Defined as: For CT, the first occurrence of Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI. For OS, the first Clinical MI only.

variable.name: MITOTALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Total MI

variable.name: MITOTALSRC
variable.comment: Total MI ascertainment source Total MI is defined as: For CT, the first occurrence of Clinical MI or Definite Silent MI. For OS, the first Clinical MI only.

variable.name: ANYCANCER
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of a non melanoma skin cancer or a Death due to cancer. Any Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ANYCANCERDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Any Cancer

variable.name: ANYCANCERSRC
variable.comment: Any Cancer ascertainment source Any Cancer is defined as the first occurence of a non melanoma skin cancer or a Death due to cancer. The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: SINUS
variable.comment: Accessory Sinus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: SINUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Accessory Sinus Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Accessory Sinus Cancer

variable.name: SINUSSRC
variable.comment: Accessory Sinus Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Accessory Sinus Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ADRENAL
variable.comment: Adrenal Gland Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ADRENALDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Adrenal Gland Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Adrenal Gland Cancer

variable.name: ADRENALSRC
variable.comment: Adrenal Gland Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Adrenal Gland Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ANAL
variable.comment: Anus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ANALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Anus Cancer

variable.name: ANALSRC
variable.comment: Anus Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Anus Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: APPENDIX
variable.comment: Appendix Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: APPENDIXDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Appendix Cancer

variable.name: APPENDIXSRC
variable.comment: Appendix Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Appendix Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BILARY
variable.comment: Biliary Tract Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BILARYDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Biliary Tract Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Biliary Tract Cancer

variable.name: BILARYSRC
variable.comment: Biliary Tract Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Biliary Tract Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BLADDER
variable.comment: Bladder Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BLADDERDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bladder Cancer

variable.name: BLADDERSRC
variable.comment: Bladder Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Bladder Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BONELIMB
variable.description: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of limbs (long bones)
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of limbs (long bones) Bone-Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BONELIMBDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bone-Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONELIMBSRC
variable.comment: Bone-Limb Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Bone-Limb Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BONENON
variable.description: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of non-limbs (face, head, torso, spine).
variable.comment: Cancer of the bones, joints or cartilage of non-limbs (face, head, torso, spine). Bone-Non Limb Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BONENONDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Bone-Non Limb Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Bone-Non Limb Cancer

variable.name: BONENONSRC
variable.comment: Bone-Non Limb Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Bone-Non Limb Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BRAIN
variable.comment: Brain Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BRAINDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Brain Cancer

variable.name: BRAINSRC
variable.comment: Brain Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Brain Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: BREAST
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Invasive or In Situ Breast Cancer. All Deaths due to breast cancer are considered Invasive Breast Cancers. Breast Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BREASTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer

variable.name: BREASTSRC
variable.comment: Breast Cancer ascertainment source Breast Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Invasive or In Situ Breast Cancer. All Deaths due to breast cancer are considered Invasive Breast Cancers. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: BREASTINV
variable.comment: Defined as a breast cancer from a Death or the first adjudication where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an invasive cancer. Breast Cancer Invasive is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. WHI adjudicated all reports of breast cancer for a ppt until the first invasive Breast Cancer. i.e. The first Invasive Breast Cancer may not be the first Breast Cancer.

variable.name: BREASTINVDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer Invasive
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer Invasive

variable.name: BREASTINVSRC
variable.comment: Breast Cancer Invasive ascertainment source Breast Cancer Invasive is defined as a breast cancer from a Death or the first adjudication where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an invasive cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer Invasive. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: BREASTINSITU
variable.comment: Defined as the first breast cancer where the form 122 or 130 details indicate an in situ cancer. Breast Cancer In Situ is adjudicated for CT and OS participants. Breast Cancer In Situ occurring on or after a Breast Cancer Invasive is not counted.

variable.name: BREASTINSITUDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Breast Cancer In Situ
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Breast Cancer In Situ

variable.name: BREASTINSITUSRC
variable.description: Breast Cancer In Situ ascertainment source
variable.comment: Breast Cancer In Situ ascertainment source Central adjudications were done for all Breast Cancer In Situ. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: CNSCA
variable.description: Cancer of central nervous system (not brain)
variable.comment: Cancer of central nervous system (not brain) Central Nervous System Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CNSCADY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Central Nervous System Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Central Nervous System Cancer

variable.name: CNSCASRC
variable.description: Central Nervous System Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Central Nervous System Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Central Nervous System Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CERVICAL
variable.comment: Cervix Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CERVICALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Cervix Cancer

variable.name: CERVICALSRC
variable.comment: Cervix Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Cervix Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: COLON
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer. Colon Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: COLONDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Colon Cancer

variable.name: COLONSRC
variable.comment: Colon Cancer ascertainment source Colon Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Colon Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: COLORECTAL
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer, Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer or Rectum Cancer. Colorectal Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: COLORECTALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Colorectal Cancer

variable.name: COLORECTALSRC
variable.comment: Colorectal Cancer ascertainment source Colorectal Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer, Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Colon Cancer, Rectosigmoid Cancer or Rectum Cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Colorectal Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: CONNECTIVE
variable.description: Cancer of connective, subcutaneous and soft tissues
variable.comment: Cancer of connective, subcutaneous and soft tissues Connective Tissue Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CONNECTIVEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Connective Tissue Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Connective Tissue Cancer

variable.name: CONNECTIVESRC
variable.comment: Connective Tissue Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Connective Tissue Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ENDOCRINE
variable.description: Cancer of endocrine glands and related structures
variable.comment: Cancer of endocrine glands and related structures Endocrine Glands Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ENDOCRINEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Endocrine Glands Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Endocrine Glands Cancer

variable.name: ENDOCRINESRC
variable.comment: Endocrine Glands Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Endocrine Glands Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ENDMTRL
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Endometrial Cancer or a Death due to Endometrial Cancer. Endometrial Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ENDMTRLDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Endometrial Cancer

variable.name: ENDMTRLSRC
variable.comment: Endometrial Cancer ascertainment source Endometrial Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Endometrial Cancer or a Death due to Endometrial Cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Endometrial Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: ESOPHAGUS
variable.comment: Esophagus Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: ESOPHAGUSDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Esophagus Cancer

variable.name: ESOPHAGUSSRC
variable.comment: Esophagus Cancer ascertainment source Central adjudications were done for all Esophagus Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

variable.name: EYE
variable.comment: Eye and Adnexa Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: EYEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Eye and Adnexa Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Eye and Adnexa Cancer

variable.name: EYESRC
variable.description: Eye and Adnexa Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Eye and Adnexa Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Eye and Adnexa Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.description: Cancer of genital organs, other or unspecified
variable.comment: Cancer of genital organs, other or unspecified Genital Organs Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: LARYNXSRC

variable.name: MELANOMASRC
variable.description: Melanoma of the Skin ascertainment source

variable.name: RECTOSIG
variable.comment: Cancer of the rectosigmoid junction Defined as the first occurence of Rectosigmoid Cancer or a Death due to Rectosigmoid Cancer. Rectosigmoid Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: RECTOSIGDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Rectosigmoid Cancer

variable.name: RECTOSIGSRC
variable.comment: Rectosigmoid Cancer ascertainment source Rectosigmoid Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Rectosigmoid Cancer or a Death due to Rectosigmoid Cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Rectosigmoid Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: RECTUM
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Rectum Cancer. Rectum Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: RECTUMDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Rectum Cancer

variable.name: RECTUMSRC
variable.comment: Rectum Cancer ascertainment source Rectum Cancer is defined as the first occurence of Rectum Cancer or a Death due to Rectum Cancer. These outcomes have different ascertaiment rules. Central adjudications were done for all Rectum Cancer. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used. During the core WHI Study, Death was adjudicated centrally in the CT and locally in the OS.

variable.name: RESP
variable.description: Cancer of respiratory system and intrathoracic.
variable.comment: Cancer of respiratory system and intrathoracic. Respiratory Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: RESPDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Respiratory Cancer

variable.name: RESPSRC
variable.comment: Respiratory Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Respiratory Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: SALIVARY
variable.description: Cancer of salivary glands, major, other or unspecified.
variable.comment: Cancer of salivary glands, major, other or unspecified. Salivary Glands Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: SALIVARYDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Salivary Glands Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Salivary Glands Cancer

variable.name: SALIVARYSRC
variable.comment: Salivary Glands Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Salivary Glands Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: STOMACHSRC
variable.comment: Stomach Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Stomach Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.comment: Thyroid Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: THYROIDDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Thyroid Cancer

variable.name: THYROIDSRC
variable.comment: Thyroid Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Thyroid Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.description: Cancer of tongue, other or unspecified part
variable.comment: Cancer of tongue, other or unspecified part Tongue Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: TONGUEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Tongue Cancer

variable.name: TONGUESRC
variable.comment: Tongue Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Tongue Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: URINARY
variable.description: Cancer of urinary organs, other or unspecified.
variable.comment: Cancer of urinary organs, other or unspecified. Urinary Organs Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: URINARYDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Urinary Organs Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Urinary Organs Cancer

variable.name: URINARYSRC
variable.comment: Urinary Organs Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Urinary Organs Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: UTERINE
variable.description: Cancer of uterus, not otherwise specified
variable.comment: Cancer of uterus, not otherwise specified Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: UTERINEDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer

variable.name: UTERINESRC
variable.description: Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer ascertainment source
variable.comment: Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Uterus, Not Spec. Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: CANCOTHER
variable.comment: Defined as an occurance of any cancer site not listed above. Other/Unknown Cancer is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: CANCOTHERDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Other/Unknown Cancer

variable.name: CANCOTHERSRC
variable.comment: Other/Unknown Cancer ascertainment source Other/Unknown Cancer is defined as an occurance of any cancer site not listed above. During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Other/Unknown Cancer. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: ANYFX
variable.comment: Defined as the first fracture of Hip, upper leg, pelvis, knee, lower leg, ankle, foot(not toe), tailbone, spine or back, lower arm or wrist, hand (not finger), elbow, upper arm or shoulder and other. Some of these outcomes are only adjudicated for a subset of WHI participants.

variable.name: ANYFXDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Any Adjudicated Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Any Adjudicated Fracture

variable.name: ANYFXSRC
variable.comment: Any Adjudicated Fracture ascertainment source Any Adjudicated Fracture is defined as the first fracture of Hip, upper leg, pelvis, knee, lower leg, ankle, foot(not toe), tailbone, spine or back, lower arm or wrist, hand (not finger), elbow, upper arm or shoulder and other. The ascertainment processes vary for these outcomes. Refer to their usage notes.

variable.name: BKANKLE
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Ankle Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKANKLEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Ankle Fracture

variable.name: BKANKLESRC
variable.comment: Ankle Fracture ascertainment source Ankle Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCARPAL
variable.comment: Carpal bones in wrist Carpal Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Carpal Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCARPALDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Carpal Fracture

variable.name: BKCARPALSRC
variable.comment: Carpal Fracture ascertainment source Carpal Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLE
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Clavical Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKCLAVICLEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Clavical Fracture

variable.name: BKCLAVICLESRC
variable.comment: Clavical Fracture ascertainment source Clavical Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKELBOWNOSSRC
variable.comment: Elbow NOS Fracture ascertainment source Elbow NOS Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.comment: Hip Fracture is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: BKHIPSRC
variable.comment: Hip Fracture ascertainment source Central adjudications were done for all Hip Fracture. If the central adjudication is not complete, local adjudication data is used.

It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Shaft of Humerus Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUHUMERUSDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper End of Humerus Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Upper End of Humerus Fracture

variable.name: BKUELBOW
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture is not counted if pathologic.

variable.name: BKUELBOWDY
variable.description: Days enrollment to Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture

variable.name: BKUELBOWSRC
variable.comment: Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture ascertainment source Upper Radius/Ulna Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: BKSPINE
variable.comment: Defined as the first occurence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was adjudicated at all clinics for CT participants. It was only adjudicated at the bone density clinics for OS participants. It was not adjudicated after the WHI study closeout. Does not include cervical fractures.

variable.name: BKSPINEDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Vertebral Fracture

variable.name: BKSPINESRC
variable.comment: Vertebral Fracture ascertainment source Vertebral Fracture is defined as the first occurence of Lumbar Spine Fracture or Thoracic Spine Fracture. Vertebral Fracture was only adjudicated locally.

variable.name: DEATH
variable.comment: Death is adjudicated for CT and OS participants.

variable.name: DEATHCAUSE
variable.comment: 'Not adjudicated' are reported deaths that have not been adjudicated either because the adjudication is in proceses or WHI was unable to get sufficient documentation to perform an adjudication.

variable.name: DEATHDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Death

variable.name: DEATHSRC
variable.comment: Death ascertainment source During the core WHI study, central adjudications of Death were only done in the CT. Local adjudication data was used for other participants. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.

variable.name: HYST
variable.comment: Hysterectomy is adjudicated for HT participants only.

variable.name: HYSTDY
variable.comment: Days from enrollment to first Hysterectomy

variable.name: HYSTSRC
variable.comment: Hysterectomy ascertainment source During the core WHI study, only local adjudications were done for Hysterectomy. After the WHI study closeout, all adjudications are done centrally.
